text: @CardinalDolan Covid-19 can’t be the cause of these schools closing. Decades of lying and covering up sexual abuse eroded belief NOT in Jesus Christ but in the Roman Catholic Church. Sell your million dollar vacation home Prince of the Church and use that money to save one school!
